title: A Methodology for the Comparison of Human Judgments With Metrics for Coreference Resolution
authors:
Borovikova, Mariya  and
Grobol, Lo{\"i}c  and
Halftermeyer, Ana{\"i}s  and
Billot, Sylvie
venue: Proceedings of the 2nd Workshop on Human Evaluation of NLP Systems (HumEval)
abstract: We propose a method for investigating the interpretability of metrics used for the coreference resolution task through comparisons with human judgments. We provide a corpus with annotations of different error types and human evaluations of their gravity. Our preliminary analysis shows that metrics considerably overlook several error types and overlook errors in general in comparison to humans. This study is conducted on French texts, but the methodology is language-independent.
